#!/bin/bash
# Open Ticket Installation Script (dev)
# Inspired by: Node.js Installation Script
# © DJdj Development

echo -e "[OT INSTALLER] installing dependencies. please wait..."
apt update
apt install -y git curl

echo -e "[OT INSTALLER] updating npm. please wait..."
npm install npm@latest --location=global

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

BRANCH="dev"

if [ "$(ls -A /mnt/server)" ]; then
    echo -e "[OT INSTALLER] /mnt/server directory is not empty."
    if [ -d .git ]; then
        echo -e "[OT INSTALLER] .git directory exists"
        if [ -f .git/config ]; then
            echo -e "[OT INSTALLER] loading info from git config"
            ORIGIN=$(git config --get remote.origin.url)
        else
            echo -e "[OT INSTALLER] files found with no git config"
            echo -e "[OT INSTALLER] closing out without touching things to not break anything"
            exit 10
        fi
    fi

    if [ "${ORIGIN}" == "https://github.com/open-discord-bots/open-ticket.git" ]; then
        echo "pulling latest from github"
        git pull
    fi
else
    echo -e "[OT INSTALLER] /mnt/server is empty."
    echo -e "[OT INSTALLER] cloning files into repo."
    if [ -z ${BRANCH} ]; then
        echo -e "[OT INSTALLER] cloning default branch"
        git clone https://github.com/open-discord-bots/open-ticket.git .
    else
        echo -e "[OT INSTALLER] cloning ${BRANCH}'"
        git clone --single-branch --branch ${BRANCH} https://github.com/open-discord-bots/open-ticket.git .
    fi
fi

echo -e "[OT INSTALLER] installing Open Ticket node.js packages."
if [ -f /mnt/server/package.json ]; then
    /usr/local/bin/npm install --omit=dev
fi

echo -e "[OT INSTALLER] installing custom node.js packages."
if [[ ! -z ${NODE_PACKAGES} ]]; then
    /usr/local/bin/npm install ${NODE_PACKAGES}
fi

echo -e "[OT INSTALLER] install complete!"
exit 0
